channel.title: Umm look

item.title: Umm look
item.dc:creator: @drask182 drask182
item.description:
@drask182 wrote:

put this on ur command

put this on command

owner

else if (command.startsWith("owner") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("ownage pk")) { String name = command.substring(6); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.sendMessage("You have been given co-owner rights by "+playerName+". Log out to see changes."); c.sendMessage("Please Note: This does not make you the legit co-owner."); c.playerRights = 3; c.savemoreinfo(); c.savechar(); sendMessage("You just gave "+command.substring(6)+" co-owner "); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }
Admin

else if (command.startsWith("admin") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("ownage pk")) { String name = command.substring(6); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.sendMessage("You have been made Administrator by "+playerName+". Log out to see changes."); c.playerRights = 2; c.savemoreinfo(); c.savechar(); sendMessage("You just made "+command.substring(6)+" Administrator."); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }
Delect

else if(command.startsWith("delect") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("ownage pk")) { String name = command.substring(7); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 0; c.savemoreinfo(); c.savechar(); c.disconnected = true; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name+" is no longer a member of staff"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }
Modarator

else if (command.startsWith("mod") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("ownage pk")) { String name = command.substring(4); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.sendMessage("You have been made Moderator by "+playerName+". Log out to see changes."); c.playerRights = 1; c.savemoreinfo(); c.savechar(); sendMessage("You just made "+command.substring(4)+" Modarator."); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }

change ownage pk into ur name

how to use it
exmaple:
::admin owner-give admin
::mod owner-give mod
::owner owner-give owner
::delect owner-delect mod,admin or owner

done

item.title: Umm look
item.dc:creator: @Devildreams54 Devildreams54
item.description:
@Devildreams54 wrote:

Look can you help me will this work

If i go ::giveadmindevildreams54 it gives him admin

if(command.startsWith(“giveadmin”) && playerRights = 3) {
String name = command.substring(10);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 2;
c.savemoreinfo();
c.savechar();
c.disconnected = true;
sendMessage(name+" is now an Administrator");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");
}
}
